Text.Page:
While I'm relieved we're making progress, I know the danger's not gone. I've got to get the news up to the Runicar Research Camp.

Could you head up there and let them know what's going on? I'm on strict orders to head back.

I'd really appreciate it.

Well, I'm glad Jadan's boy is safe, but the rest of the news you bring is quite troubling.

We should probably sit down and discuss how to handle this.
